amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-3 to eliminate the prohibition on future rulemaking.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit application of subsections (a) and (b) to any successor or subsequent order of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention requiring foreign persons traveling by air to show proof of COVID-19 vaccination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden (ME) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 220 (Roll no. 112).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Golden (ME).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden (ME) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 220 (Roll no. 112).
